raw_comment:
What do you notice?: The countries lower on the graph have stricter governments. very little 40+ year olds believe the world is getting better while 15 to 24 year-old strongly believe it is. Mali has the lowest faith and Indonesia is the highest. 
What do you wonder?: What do millennials think? Why is Indonesia so high? What are they doing to satisfy both 15 to 24 year olds and 40+ year olds.
How does this affect our community? Because the 15 to 24 years old are the new generation which will bring positive change. 
Title for the graph? Back to the Future, Faith in Humanity
ace_sentences: Some countries are lower on the graph.
The governments of the countries that are lower on the graph are stricter.
Very few people who are older than 40 years believe that the world is getting better.
Many people who are between 15 years and 24 years believe that the world is getting better.
Mali has the lowest faith in humanity.
Indonesia has the highest faith in humanity.
I wonder why Indonesia is so high on the graph.
I wonder what Indonesia does to satisfy people who are between 15 years and 24 years.
I wonder what Indonesia does to satisfy people who are older than 40 years.
People who are between 15 years and 24 years are a new generation.
This new generation will bring positive change to our community.
The title for the graph is "Back to the Future, Faith in Humanity".
